mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t_right.right_name,t_right.url,t_right.tr_id FROM t_right RIGHT JOIN t_role_right ON t_right.tr_id = t_role_right.right_tr_id Right JOIN t_tu_role ON t_role_right.role_tr_id = t_tu_role.role_tr_id WHERE t_tu_role.u_tu_id= 1 = #{tuId}
SELECT t_role.role_name FROM t_u JOIN t_tu_role ON t_u.tu_id = t_tu_role.u_tu_id JOIN t_role ON t_tu_role.role_tr_id = t_role.tr_id WHERE t_u.tu_id = #{tuId}
